title: The Left Wants You Silenced # 996 (Ep 996)
description:
In this episode I address the left’s latest attack on speech using the tech companies and how we should all fight back. I also address the panic in the deep state about an upcoming interview. Finally, I address why John Brennan’s security clearance is still active. News Picks:The backlash is growing after YouTube caves to a radical liberal’s demands. 

Nancy Pelosi wants to see President Trump “in prison.”

The southern border situation has deteriorated into a “full blown emergency.”

Are swamp rats ignoring Trump’s orders to pull Brennan’s security clearance?

Christopher Steele is getting nervous about the investigation into Spygate.

Copyright Dan Bongino All Rights Reserved.
